column2: There are rumours from travellers that a horde of beastmen are headed this way.
There are rumours from travellers that a horde of chaos tribesmen are headed this way.
This ruler is experiencing a period of instability and discord.
This vassal is well-liked and ambitious.
This character has opened a portal to the realms of chaos, and will continue to summon daemons until dealt with.
This greenskin has acquired holy greenskin artifacts and the respect of many greenskins.  He is cunningly brutal.
This character has mastered the arts of necromancy, and will continue to summon undead hordes until dealt with.
This character is an accomplished necromancer.
A Prince of Khorne succeeds in creating a portal to the realms of chaos and begins his conquests.
A Prince of Nurgle succeeds in creating a portal to the realms of chaos and begins his conquests.
A Prince of Tzeentch succeeds in creating a portal to the realms of chaos and begins his conquests.
A Prince of Slaanesh succeeds in creating a portal to the realms of chaos and begins his conquests.
A Horde of Beastman begin a rampage of destruction.
This ruler will experience a 20-year bout of instability and discord.  Recommended to use with Rebel Vassal Leader on a powerful vassal.
This will make a vassal ambitious and well-liked.  Recommended to use with Time of Troubles on top liege.
This ruler will receive excellent advisors, vastly enhancing his rule.
This sends somewhat scaling generic culture reinforcements (min 2k).
You have opened a portal and gained the favor of Khorne.
You have opened a portal and gained the favor of Nurgle.
You have opened a portal and gained the favor of Tzeentch.
You have opened a portal and gained the favor of Slaanesh.
I JUST WANNA SHARE MY PRECIOUS WITH YOU GUYS
SOME OF THEM WANNA ABUSE YOU
Daemons spill through your portal, ready to destroy your enemies.
Papa Nurgle has shared his creations with the people of your realm.  He's so awesome!
Beastmen that have flocked in groups to your realm have gathered and attacked a neighbor.
Tzeentch seeps into the cracks of reality, growing his influence.
You can make cakes out of warp dust.
Travellers tell rumours of large packs of beastmen travelling in our general direction.
A secret master necromancer reveals himself and begins his conquests.
Turns the selected character into an average necromancer.
Turns the selected character into an undead champion.
A necromancer discovers how to raise large amounts of undead.  (To be used on an existing necromancer to simulate Vlad-type summoning.)
The dead rise to your call.
You have the knowledge and tools needed to summon masses of the dead to serve your will.
You are a master necromancer, and the living and the dead will bow to your will.
You have been transformed by a ritual into a sentient undead.
You have the knowledge and tools needed to summon masses of the dead to serve your will.
